detail_desc: Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Round-necked blouse in a patterned viscose weave with buttons down the back, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a decorative bow at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with side stripes and wide ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jersey-lined joggers in a cotton weave with elasticated ribbing and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, and concealed double-breasted fastening at the front. Jetted front pockets and a flare to the hem. Lined.
Top in soft jersey with a motif on the front, a round neckline, long sleeves and a rounded hem.
V-neck cardigan in a soft, loose, chunky knit with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Trainer sandals in cotton canvas with a hook and loop strap over the feet. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) toe caps and soles.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a collar and drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and reflective details.

Fully lined bikini top with a tie detail at the front, underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the front and ribbing around the armholes, cuffs and hem.
Fancy dress costume in shiny, printed jersey with a seam at the waist and a lined, glittery tulle skirt with an asymmetric hem.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Double-layered yoke with a seam and pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a collar, button placket and chest pocket. Detachable tie belt at the waist, discreet pockets in the side seams, and a rounded hem.
Top in softly draping silk with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a gathered neckline.
Retro-look sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt jacket in cotton twill with a soft brushed finish. Collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves, cuffs with a press-stud, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Short Tencel™ lyocell shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and short slits at the hems.

Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with buttons down the front and a large, double-layered collar with a narrow frill trim. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hairband with leaf and flower appliqués.
Flared, calf-length skirt in sturdy satin made from a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose blend with a sheen. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in one side. Unlined.
Sandals with narrow straps and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide top in closely-woven mesh with a round neckline, print motif on the front, cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Leggings with a print on one leg and a contrasting colour waist panel.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with decorative V-shaped seams at the top. Slightly looser fit with an extra high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hair elastics in a crêpe weave.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with a V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour trim. High waist with covered elastication and rounded hems.
Cardigan in a soft, rib-knit, marled cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. No buttons.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Short-sleeved shirt in washed linen with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves that have covered elastication at the hems. Elasticated seam and narrow ties under the bust and a flared skirt with a tier. Unlined.
Slides with thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in superstretch twill with shaped knee patches, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Knitted jacket with a soft pile lining, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets.
Jumper in a fine, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative, tasselled drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Calf-length dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a grandad collar, V-neck opening and concealed buttons down the front. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Narrow metal rings in various sizes and designs.
Trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and press-stud, front pockets and slim legs with creases.

Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in stretch cotton twill with an off-centre zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Fake pockets with a zip, and a detachable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Unlined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.
Flared skirt in a sturdy jacquard weave with a sheen, with an elasticated drawstring waist and pleats. Unlined.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Sandals in imitation leather with a decorative appliqué on the front, ankle strap with a hook and loop tab and a loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.

Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with animal print motifs, an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Shorts in a crinkled viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, decorative ties at the front and a small frill trim at the top.

Handbag in sturdy imitation leather with two adjustable handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. One large outer compartment with a twist-lock fastening, three large inner compartments, one with a zip, and one small inner compartment. Gold-coloured details and an imitation suede lining in a contrasting colour. Size 14.5x24x35 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft, patterned jersey. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, and short sleeves with overlocked edges. Shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and overlocked hems.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Fabric-covered, USB 2.0 charging cable suitable for iPhones 5/5c/5s and iPhone 6/6s. Length 1 m. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.

Calf-length shirt dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in imitation suede with concealed elastication at the waist and a decorative seam down the legs.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Jacket in airy linen with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. One chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Long, fine-knit jacket with notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length jeggings in stretch twill with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves with wide panels down the sides, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with raw edges and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved  jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with terry inside.
